h1_title: Keeper of the Flaming Mountains and Yin-Yang Fish
h2_title: Keeper of the Flaming Mountains and Yin-Yang Fish Boss Fight and Guide
content: Ma Tianba uses a whip and has his own health bar that resembles a normal enemy's health bar. The fight is fairly straightforward in this first phase, but as soon as you've defeated the horse guai, the Keeper of the Flaming Mountains drops the Yin-Yang Fish into the water.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Keeper_of_the_Flaming_Mountains_and_Yin-Yang_Fish.md', within the main section titled 'Keeper of the Flaming Mountains and Yin-Yang Fish', specifically from the subsection 'Keeper of the Flaming Mountains and Yin-Yang Fish Boss Fight and Guide' and the sub-subsection 'Missable Transformation Spell'.
The content is as follows:
Ma Tianba uses a whip and has his own health bar that resembles a normal enemy's health bar. The fight is fairly straightforward in this first phase, but as soon as you've defeated the horse guai, the Keeper of the Flaming Mountains drops the Yin-Yang Fish into the water.
